name: Escape From Moon Road
description:
This is my very first game I have created. It is a final project for a college course I'm taking.

Escape From Moon Road is a short escape room game with a setting in rural Georgia. The goal of the game is to escape a small shack that you wake up inside of in the middle of the night. The game is made with Unity and I may be redesigning the interaction functions to be something nicer.  This is the current final product but there may be future changes.

Thank you for checking this project out!
